name: Wanted Melody
summary: A surprising western movie directed by 3 Supinfocom students, Paul Jaulmes, Boris Croisé, and Guillaume Cunis, the whole on an orchestral music composed by Mael Oudin
info:
• 中文名: 蛋蛋牛仔
  • 上映年度: 2013年
  • 片长: 7min
  • 官方网站: wanted-melody.com/
  • 导演: Paul Jaulmes / Boris Croisé / Guillaume Cunis
